name: Crazed Hits
description: The Music Industry's Leading A&R Site
overview:
Crazed Hits is the music industry’s leading A&R Site and used as a resource by Executives from every major record label and music publisher in the world, including Sony, Warner, EMI, and Universal, as well as media and entertainment companies such as MTV, MySpace Music, CAA, William Morris, and Fox Music.

Through Crazed Hits, unsigned bands and artists are placed directly in front of the music industry’s most powerful gatekeepers, which has lead to many acts signing lucrative publishing and record deals.

Every artist featured on Crazed Hits is handpicked by Alex Wilhelm, the company’s 24-year old Founder and CEO.

Since launching Crazed Hits in February 2008, Alex has discovered and highlighted over 100 major label recording artists prior to their signings, including platinum selling and Grammy-nominated artists and writers such as Drake, Owl City, Kid Cudi, BC Jean, Kesha, and LMFAO, who scored a combined total of over 20 number ones worldwide.
